pingball.simulation.gadget

Class Absorber

  • java.lang.Object
    • pingball.simulation.GameObject
      • pingball.simulation.gadget.Gadget
        • pingball.simulation.gadget.Absorber

  • public class Absorber
extends Gadget
    Represents an absorber. The location of this object is relative to the board. It will absorb any ball that collides with it, removing it from the board and stop its motion. When its action was called, it shoots the least recent stored ball vertically. Rep-Invariant: LastShotBall can be null, but other variables cant The width and height must be nonnegative The gridlocation must be in the way that the absorber does not exceed the board when combing with the width/height

      • Absorber

        public Absorber(Board board,
        java.lang.String name,
        GridLocation location,
        int width,
        int height)
        Creates an absorber
        Parameters:
        board - The Board on which the absorber is.
        name - The name of this absorber.
        location - The grid location of the top left corner of the absorber.
        width - The width of the absorber.
        height - The height of the absorber.

    • Method Detail

      • checkRep

        public boolean checkRep()
        Check the rep-invariant of this object
        Returns:
        whether the rep is ok

      • action

        public void action()
        Performs the action of this absorber. If there is a ball in the absorber and no ball earlier shot is currently still inside the absorber, it shoots a ball toward the top.
        Specified by:
        action in class Gadget

      • gridRepresentation

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> gridRepresentation()
        Returns a list of strings for the string representation of the absorber. Each string in the list "=" symbol repeated for width number of times, where width is the width of the absorber. The number of such strings in the list is equal to the height of the absorber.
        Specified by:
        gridRepresentation in class GameObject
        Returns:
        The grid representation.

      • timeUntilCollision

        public Pair<java.lang.Double,Collidable> timeUntilCollision(Ball ball)
        Returns the minimum time after which the ball will collide with some collidable in this game object, and also returns the collidable with which it will collide.
        Overrides:
        timeUntilCollision in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        ball - The ball that will collide
        Returns:
        The pair of the minimum time and the collidable with which the ball will collide after that time.

      • collide

        public void collide(Ball ball,
           Collidable collidable)
        Collides the ball with a particular collidable in this absorber. For an absorber, this means that the ball is absorbed into the absorber.
        Overrides:
        collide in class Gadget
        Parameters:
        ball - The ball to collide
        collidable - The collidable with which the ball collides
